news.headline: Indian AI Startup Raises $100M in Series B Funding
news.description: Bengaluru-based AI company secures major funding from global investors to expand its machine learning platform across Southeast Asia.

news.headline: Apple to Launch Manufacturing Unit in Tamil Nadu
news.description: Tech giant Apple announces plans to establish a new iPhone manufacturing facility in Chennai, creating 50,000 jobs.

news.headline: India's Tech Exports Hit Record $200 Billion Mark
news.description: Indian IT industry achieves historic milestone with software and services exports reaching $200 billion, driven by cloud computing and digital transformation.

news.headline: AIIMS Develops Revolutionary Cancer Treatment Protocol
news.description: All India Institute of Medical Sciences announces breakthrough in immunotherapy treatment, showing 80% success rate in early trials.

news.headline: Indian Semiconductor Firm Partners with TSMC
news.description: Tata Electronics signs strategic partnership with Taiwan Semiconductor to build advanced chip fabrication plant in Gujarat.

news.headline: India Launches 5G Satellite Internet Service
news.description: ISRO and Reliance Jio collaborate to launch satellite-based 5G internet service, targeting rural and remote areas across the country.

news.headline: Major Cybersecurity Breach Averted by Indian CERT
news.description: Indian Computer Emergency Response Team successfully thwarts sophisticated ransomware attack targeting banking infrastructure.

news.headline: Indian Gaming Industry Crosses $3 Billion Revenue
news.description: Mobile gaming dominates as India's gaming sector sees 40% YoY growth, becoming world's fastest-growing gaming market.

news.headline: NVIDIA Opens AI Research Center in Pune
news.description: GPU giant NVIDIA inaugurates state-of-the-art AI research facility in Pune, focusing on autonomous vehicles and deep learning.

news.headline: Google Expands Cloud Region in Mumbai
news.description: Google Cloud announces expansion of its Mumbai region with three new availability zones, doubling capacity for enterprise customers.
